definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Workers weave silk thread into beautiful shirts.
sentences.chinese: 工人把絲線織成漂亮的襯衫。

sentences.english: The linear density and unevenness of PET spun staple fiber were measured by vibration method.
sentences.chinese: 介紹用振動儀測試滌綸原絲線密度及其不勻率。

sentences.english: Diameter with no scouring fabric woven silk fabric called hygiene.
sentences.chinese: 用未徑練染絲線織成的織物稱之爲生織物。

sentences.english: These are the threads that weave the tapestry of humanity’s story.
sentences.chinese: 它們是編織人類歷史掛毯的絲線。

sentences.english: Splenic embolization in treatment of hypersplenism using both silk threads and gelfoam.
sentences.chinese: 絲線加明膠海綿脾臟栓塞治療脾功能亢進。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, about 30 kinds of colors of silk strands will be used when weaving carpets.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，一塊絲毯要用上三十來種不同顏色的絲線。

sentences.english: The silk thread cans not see clearly is which house, but affirmation comes from Chiang-Nan.
sentences.chinese: 絲線看不出來是哪家的，但肯定是從江南來的。

sentences.english: The animals build webs with their own soft, naturally-made silk.
sentences.chinese: 它們用自己柔軟天然的絲線織就蜘蛛網。

sentences.english: Han Jin is to use a variety of color made of woven silk and metallic yarn.
sentences.chinese: 漢錦是用各種彩色絲線和金銀線交織而成的。

sentences.english: She was sitting at a spinning wheel, spinning silken threads of many colors.
sentences.chinese: 她正坐在一輛紡車前，織着各種顏色的絲線。

sentences.english: The technique gave rise to reticello (mesh) and retortoli (twisted) filigree glass.
sentences.chinese: 這項技術最終發展出了金銀絲線玻璃。

sentences.english: The notebooks are thread-bound on acid-free paper.
sentences.chinese: 軟封面筆記本選用無酸紙，並以絲線書本法釘裝。

sentences.english: The treatment procedure of distal end of nylon monofilament line was investigated particularly.
sentences.chinese: 並對尼龍單絲線末端的處理進行了較詳細的研究。

sentences.english: The end of the lights couldn't be reach. Who was the poor puppet?
sentences.chinese: 目光再遠也看不到絲線盡頭，誰是那個可憐的木偶。

sentences.english: Silk yarn twisting is a direct way to bring forth crepe effect on the surface of heavy-weight crepes.
sentences.chinese: 絲線加捻是使真絲重縐織物起縐效應的直接手段。

sentences.english: The thread so that I can knit it into a cardigan.
sentences.chinese: 我在把羊毛紡成絲線，用它來編一件毛衫。

definition: the shaft of a pen or writing brush/pen-holder/pen
silver needle (fine needle used in acupuncture)
venation (pattern of veins on a leaf)
